Metadata.title: G-Matrix: Gluten-Free Vibe Check
Metadata.description: Find gluten-free products and check their vibe with community ratings.

Login.signInDescription: Sign in with Google to continue to the admin dashboard.
Login.loginSuccessDescription: Welcome back! Redirecting you to the admin dashboard...
Login.loginFailedDescription: Could not sign you in with Google. Reason: {error}

Admin.accessDeniedDescription: You do not have permission to view this page.

ProductPage.productNotFoundDescription: The product "{name}" could not be found.

VibeCheck.unnamedDescription: We couldn't identify this product. Please name it.
VibeCheck.identifiedDescription: The product identified from your image.
VibeCheck.aiCouldntRead: Our AI couldn't read the name. Please enter it below to continue.
VibeCheck.invalidInputDescription: Please enter a valid product name.

ProductList.title: Product Details
ProductList.scanToStart: Scan a product to get started!

AdminProductList.title: Product Management
AdminProductList.scanToStart: Scan a product to get started!
AdminProductList.confirmDeleteDesc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the product and all its associated votes and reports.

VotingPanel.title: Vibe Check
VotingPanel.description: How was your experience with this product?
VotingPanel.vibeSubmittedDesc: Your vibe for {productName} has been recorded. Now you can fine-tune it.

FineTunePanel.title: Fine-Tune Your Vibe
FineTunePanel.description: Drag the dot or use the sliders to precisely place this product on the G-Matrix.
FineTunePanel.fineTuneCompleteDesc: Your detailed rating has been saved.

ImageUploadDialog.title: Scan a Product
ImageUploadDialog.description: Upload a photo or use your camera to scan a product, and we'll try to identify it for you.

ImageUploadForm.fileTooLargeDesc: Please upload an image smaller than 5MB.

CameraCapture.cameraAccessDeniedDesc: Please enable camera permissions in your browser settings.
CameraCapture.cameraNotSupportedDesc: Your browser does not support camera access.
CameraCapture.captureFailedDesc: Could not capture image. Please try again.
CameraCapture.cameraAccessRequiredDesc: Please allow camera access to use this feature. You may need to refresh the page after granting permissions.
CameraCapture.analysisFailedDesc: Could not identify the product from the image.
